chapter.text:
You walk to the door and turn the handle. ^1500 It’s unlocked. ^1500 As you open the door, you’re greeted to a short hallway leading to a small storage room. ^1500 The lights are on. ^1500
You walk in and take a look around. In the center of the room sits a TV hooked up to a VCR. ^1500 Tapes in stacks around it.^1500 Some unravelled in piles of film. ^1500 Weird.
